summary: I'm waiting for you followers of small vampire?
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#e06666][size=3][i]Description[/i][/size][/color][/b][size=3]:[/size]
She is a girl, but do not be fooled by its appearance. She is a vampire. You will live longer than you probably and would use magic like no what you have seen. But I want you to worry. It's on your side, she is as long as you do not hurt. She is waiting in Mara's Eye Pond you. The raised went to pick us. But to take out of it I want you to just ... night.
[img]http://38.media.tumblr.com/cd4f000330873b679ee5d5214d2c6ae1/tumblr_nda9jfffuP1tb0f23o2_1280.jpg[/img]

[size=3][b][i][color=#e06666]Details[/color][/i][/b]:[/size]
[b]name[/b] - Farith Granius
[b]race[/b] - Vampire (Race as a human being? I do not know it.)
[b]Class[/b] - Mage
[b]Min Level[/b] - 10
[b]Max Level[/b] - Unlimited
[b]Perks[/b] - Light Foot, Mage Armor(Rank 3), Magic Resistance(Rank 3), Stability, Necromancy, Dark Souls
[b]Ability[/b] - Resist Frost 50, Weakness to Fire 50, Night Stalker’s Footsteps, Resist Poison 100,  Resist Disease 100, Paralysis invalid, Weakness to Sunlight
[b]Other features[/b] - Unarmed Damage 50, Essential
[b]Body type[/b] - UNPetite

[b]Location[/b] - Mara’s Eye Pond

[b]Marriage[/b] - OK (*Please have introduced the option file.)

[color=#e06666][size=3][b][i]Requirements[/i][/b][/size][/color]:
[size=3]DLC1 [b]Dawnguard[/b]

[b][color=#e06666][i]Installation[/i][/color]　&　[color=#e06666][i]Uninstallation[/i][/color][/b]:[/size]
Added or deleted, the following files.

VampireFarith.esp
Meshes\actors\character\VampireFarith
Meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\VampireFarith.esp
Textures\Actors\character\VampireFarith
Textures\Actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\VampireFarith.esp

Please or using tools such as [b]NMM[/b].

[b][color=#e06666][size=3][i]Recommended MODS[/i][/size][/color][/b]:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url] by tktk

[b][i][color=#e06666][size=3]Change log[/size][/color][/i][/b]:
1.1 - Need to introduce an options file in order to get married is no longer.
        I compressed texture files that have not been compressed several.
        I was housed in the BSA all the files other than the ESP.

1.0 - Publication

[b][color=#e06666][size=3][i]Credit[/i][/size][/color][/b]:

[url=http://luminalion.tumblr.com/]Girl of Innocence[/url]　by Lumina
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19623/?]Cazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion[/url] by zzjay by cazy and zzjay
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1909/?]RV Vampire eyes[/url] by Pema Mendez
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix[/url] by Mr Dave
